settings.title: Happiness Delivered

settings.title:
Build The Perfect Box
Just For You
settings.description: Get everything you want and nothing you don’t –you’re in control! Atlas Bar’s fully customizable Build A Box experience will make going to the grocery store a thing of the past.

settings.title: The Next Generation Protein Bar Has Arrived
settings.description: Atlas Bar is the world’s best-tasting high-performance protein bar made with only the highest quality real food ingredients your body and mind need to succeed.

settings.title: Adaptogen Powered Benefits
settings.description: The first protein bar of its kind specially formulated with Organic KSM-66 Ashwagandha, a potent science-backed adaptogen revered for centuries around the world as “nature’s gift to mankind."

settings.quote: “Could this be the best keto-friendly protein bar ever?” -Gear Patrol
"You might expect a low sugar protein bar to be lacking in flavor, but that’s not the case when it comes to Atlas Bar."   -VerywellFit.com
“Atlas Bar is in a league of its own. It’s very rare that a bar makes its way into my life. These are in my purse, and my travel bag. Two thumbs up!” -Hungry Girl
“You can see this bar has a little more protein, it uses grass-fed whey, which is an easily absorbed protein source. Plus, the Vanilla Almond Chai flavor is delicious!” -Women's Health

settings.title: On-The-Go-Breakfast
settings.quote: “ These protein bars are the BEST! They're full of clean ingredients and they taste AMAZING! Low sugar, high protein, high-fiber. Keeps you full for hours!! ”
settings.author: - Peggy R.

settings.title: Post Workout Recovery
settings.quote: “ It's hard to find protein bars that are low sugar & made with quality ingredients. These not only meet those criteria, but also taste amazing. Perfect when you’re on the go or need quick recovery food post-workout. ”
settings.author: - Mark H.

settings.title: Keto-Friendly Snack
settings.quote: “ These bars come through wonderfully on all counts, and taste great! So happy to find protein bars I can rely on. ”
settings.author: - Lisa W.

settings.title: Guilt-Free Dessert
settings.quote: “ I found these bars to be very tasty and hit the sweet tooth perfect. They are not hard where you think you’ll loose a tooth but the right amount of soft chewy goodness. ”
settings.author: - Liz S.

settings.title: The Fuel Your Body & Mind Need To Succeed
settings.description: Wake up energized, sleep soundly, and feel focused throughout the day—it’s your time to shine!

settings.quote: “I love that these bars are low in sugar & high in protein with quality ingredients.”
settings.author: - Lindsay K.

settings.quote: “Really kickstarts my day with healthy ingredients & even gives me steady energy.”
settings.author: - Bella H.

settings.quote: “They are filling and tasty and helped me in my journey to become healthier.”
settings.author: - Steven G.

settings.quote: “I really love the taste of these bars. They're such a good treat & extremely healthy.”
settings.author: - Shyla C.

settings.quote: “These are my favorite bars! They do not taste chalky and they keep me full.”
settings.author: - Chelsea M.

Powered
settings.description:
Pronounced osh-wah-gand-da
(don’t worry, it took us 6 months before we could say it) is a small shrub (like cranberries) that has been used for over 5,000 years in India to promote mind + body wellness.

James Oliver, Founder

settings.title:
Feeling good
tastes great.

settings.title: MIND
settings.description:
Reduce everyday stress.
Improve focus.

settings.title: BODY
settings.description:
Reduce cravings.
Elevate energy.

settings.title: WELLNESS
settings.description:
Boost immunity.
Improve sleep quality.

settings.title: Ashwagandha Powered
settings.description: Better for your body, starting with your mind—so you can live, work, think and feel your best.
Sweet, salty, rich and delicious – what’s not to love?
Creamy almond butter, fresh cocoa powder, and dark chocolate chips—chocolate lovers unite!
Warning!!! This modern take on the classic PB&J has been known to cause severe happiness.
Remember those cookies Grandma used to make? It’s like that, only better.
A kiss of cool mint + rich chocolatey goodness...former Girl Scouts beware!
Some say it tastes like a snickerdoodle, others a churro. We’ll let you decide!

settings.title: Atlas On-Demand
settings.description: We make subscriptions fun, flexible, and hassle-free.

settings.title: Atlas On-Demand
settings.description: Whether on-the-go or working from home, staying fit, fueled, and feeling good has never been easier. Keep your pantry stocked with the flavors you love—delivered straight to your doorstep.

settings.item_content: Absolutely! Unlike typical subscriptions, we make it really easy - simply email us at vip@atlasbars.com with "CANCEL".

settings.item_title: What if I don’t end up liking them?
settings.item_content: We offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you don't love your Trial Pack, it's on us.

settings.item_title: When do I build my custom box?
settings.item_content: After you've received your Trial Pack and tried all the flavors, we'll send you a link to build your custom box. You can mix + match as many flavors as you want, as well as make changes to your subscription.

settings.item_title: Can Atlas Bars be used as a meal replacement?
settings.item_content: Absolutely! With 15g+ protein and 10g+ fiber, Atlas Bars fill you up and help curb cravings. Many of our customers eat Atlas Bars for breakfast, in between meals, or as a guilt-free dessert that fits their low-sugar lifestyle.

Not a chance! We use a resistant starch tapioca fiber that won’t spike your blood sugar levels. It’s keto-friendly, low-glycemic, and safe for diabetics. Not only that, it can help curb cravings and supports healthy hormone signaling. Mind + body win!

settings.title: Let's
settings.description: Every great achievement was once considered impossible.

settings.title: Give $10. Get $10.
settings.description: Earn 1,000 points every time you refer a friend who makes their first purchase.

settings.item_title: Does it cost anything to sign up or be a member?
settings.item_content: Nope! The program is completely free of charge and you can deactivate your account whenever you’d like (although we hope you never do).
Once you have your account set up, you’re all set to start earning points. Earn 1 point for every $1 spent and get 3X points for On-Demand purchases.

settings.item_title: How do I redeem my points?
settings.item_content:
You can redeem your points for rewards such as cash off your next order or exclusive Atlas Bar swag.

Every 1,000 points = $10 Atlas Rewards

settings.item_title: How can I check my current balance?
settings.item_content: You can keep track of how many points you’ve earned by logging into your account (or creating an account) and visiting our Atlas Rewards page.
Nope! These are your hard earned points, we wouldn't want to take them from you.
